task-wr.title: Creating a Glance Image Using the Heat Template with the cache_raw Option
task-wr.shortdesc: Glance supports multiple ways of getting an image.

li.p: Copied from an URL. In this case Glance downloads the image from the remote location and stores it locally.

Directly as an external image (that is, an HTTP URL). In this case, Glance just stores the external URL and does not download the image at all (that is, no space is used at all but the image is downloaded from the external location each time it is used).

section.p: Option 1 and option 3 are both supported by CLI and by Heat. Option 2 is supported only by the CLI when â€“copy-from is specified.
In RAW Caching, Titanium Server supports options 1 and 2, but does not support external images (option 3).
